scripts.clean:ports: lsof -ti:3000 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true && lsof -ti:8081 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true && lsof -ti:8082 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.dev:backend: lsof -ti:3000 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true && cd ../BookIT-backend && npm run dev
scripts.dev:all: npm run clean:ports && sleep 1 && concurrently -n "backend,expo" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:expo"
scripts.demo: npm run clean:ports && sleep 1 && EXPO_NO_METRO_LAZY=1 expo start --go --clear --ios
scripts.demo:full: npm run clean:ports && sleep 1 && concurrently -n "backend,expo" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold" "npm run dev:backend" "EXPO_NO_METRO_LAZY=1 expo start --go --clear --ios"
scripts.demo:sim: open -a Simulator && sleep 2 && npm run demo:full
